sait.mls.persistence.clientale

Class ClientBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.mls.persistence.clientale.ClientBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broker

    public class ClientBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Broker
    Class description: A broker for Clients to be used by the MLS GUI using JDBC.
    Author:
    Christian Garrovillo
